mapper.select: select e.emp_name,sum(c.contract_money)as contract_money,e.emp_no ,to_char(c.contract_date_start, 'yyyy-MM') as contract_date_start_goal from emp e left join contract c on e.emp_no = c.emp_no group by e.emp_name,e.emp_no ,to_char(c.contract_date_start, 'yyyy-MM')

select e.emp_name,sum(c.contract_money)as contract_money,e.emp_no ,to_char(c.contract_date_start, 'yyyy-MM') as contract_date_start_goal from emp e left join contract c on e.emp_no = c.emp_no group by e.emp_name,e.emp_no , to_char(c.contract_date_start, 'yyyy-MM') having to_char(c.contract_date_start, 'yyyy-MM') like ''||#{gdata}||'%'
select sum(contract_money) as contract_money_sum from contract where emp_no=#{emp_no}
mapper.insert: insert into goal values( (select max(goal_no)+1 from goal), (select emp_no from emp where emp_no=#{emp_no}), #{goal_money},to_date(#{goal_date_start},'yyyy-mm'))
mapper.select: select count(goal_no)as goal_count from goal where emp_no=#{emp_no} and goal_date=to_date(#{goal_date_start},'yyyy-mm')
